name: Trinaze: A Dark Trail
description:
Wonder being TRapped IN A mAZE with darkness and blood sucking creature with just a torch in a hand.......... Isn't it just enough to describe an horrific End.

Get ready to witness a spine chilling game, that forces you to rethink upon the idea of freedom. The game can also be used as a strategy game to develop problem solving and memory.  

Happy Gaming !!!
